arts.ttl: Morgan Guilavogui masterclass propels St. Pauli to first home win of the season against Union Berlin
arts.sum: St. Pauli secured their first home win of the season with a 3-0 victory over Union Berlin, thanks to Morgan Guilavogui's two goals and an assist. Morgan Guilavogui takes a shot on goal, demonstrating his attacking prowess throughout the match - IMAGO/Andreas Hannig

arts.ttl: Guilavogui shines as St. Pauli secure deserved win
arts.sum: In a clash between two sides scrapping for points at the bottom end of the Bundesliga, St. Pauli secured just their second home win of the season, overcoming Union Berlin by three goals to nil thanks to a Morgan Guilavogui double, and a late strike from Daniel Sinani.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. Union Berlin preview: Die Eisernen desperate to avoid another away defeat
arts.sum: Union Berlin will look to end a run of five consecutive Bundesliga away defeats when they travel to the Millerntor-Stadion for Sundayâ€™s meeting with St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: Preview: St Pauli vs. Union Berlin - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between St Pauli and Union Berlin, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

Union grabbed their first win in 11 league games last Sunday to move up to 13th, six points from relegation trouble. 2.Bundesliga champions St Pauli sit three points from the relegation places after ...
